ivardefs.name: authoredOn
ivardefs.desc: The date (and perhaps time) when the prescription was initially written or authored on.

ivardefs.name: basedOn_
ivardefs.desc: A plan or request that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this medication request.

ivardefs.name: category_
ivardefs.desc: Indicates the grouping or category of medication request (for example, where the medication is expected to be consumed or administered (i.e. inpatient or outpatient)).

ivardefs.name: courseOfTherapyType
ivardefs.desc: The description of the overall pattern of the administration of the medication to the patient.

ivardefs.name: detectedIssue_
ivardefs.desc: Indicates an actual or potential clinical issue with or between one or more active or proposed clinical actions for a patient; e.g. Drug-drug interaction, duplicate therapy, dosage alert etc.

ivardefs.name: dispenseRequest
ivardefs.desc: Indicates the specific details for the dispense or medication supply part of a medication request (also known as a Medication Prescription or Medication Order).  Note that this information is not always sent with the order.  There may be in some settings

ivardefs.name: doNotPerform
ivardefs.desc: If true indicates that the provider is asking for the medication request not to occur.

ivardefs.name: dosageInstruction_
ivardefs.desc: Indicates how the medication is to be used by the patient.

ivardefs.name: encounter
ivardefs.desc: The Encounter during which this [x] was created or to which the creation of this record is tightly associated.

ivardefs.name: eventHistory_
ivardefs.desc: Links to Provenance records for past versions of this resource or fulfilling request or event resources that identify key state transitions or updates that are likely to be relevant to a user looking at the current version of the resource.

ivardefs.name: groupIdentifier
ivardefs.desc: A shared identifier common to all requests that were authorized more or less simultaneously by a single author, representing the identifier of the requisition or prescription.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: Identifiers associated with this medication request that are defined by business processes and/or used to refer to it when a direct URL reference to the resource itself is not appropriate. They are business identifiers assigned to this resource by the per

ivardefs.name: informationSource
ivardefs.desc: The person or organization who provided the information about this request, if the source is someone other than the requestor.  This is often used when the MedicationRequest is reported by another person.

ivardefs.name: instantiatesCanonical_
ivardefs.desc: The URL pointing to a protocol, guideline, orderset, or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this MedicationRequest.

ivardefs.name: instantiatesUri_
ivardefs.desc: The URL pointing to an externally maintained protocol, guideline, orderset or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this MedicationRequest.

ivardefs.name: insurance_
ivardefs.desc: Insurance plans, coverage extensions, pre-authorizations and/or pre-determinations that may be required for delivering the requested service.

ivardefs.name: intent
ivardefs.desc: Whether the request is a proposal, plan, or an original order.

ivardefs.name: note_
ivardefs.desc: Extra information about the prescription that could not be conveyed by the other attributes.

ivardefs.name: performer
ivardefs.desc: The specified desired performer of the medication treatment (e.g. the performer of the medication administration).

ivardefs.name: performerType
ivardefs.desc: Indicates the type of performer of the administration of the medication.

ivardefs.name: priority
ivardefs.desc: Indicates how quickly the Medication Request should be addressed with respect to other requests.

ivardefs.name: priorPrescription
ivardefs.desc: A link to a resource representing an earlier order related order or prescription.

ivardefs.name: reasonCode_
ivardefs.desc: The reason or the indication for ordering or not ordering the medication.

ivardefs.name: reasonReference_
ivardefs.desc: Condition or observation that supports why the medication was ordered.

ivardefs.name: recorder
ivardefs.desc: The person who entered the order on behalf of another individual for example in the case of a verbal or a telephone order.

ivardefs.name: reported
ivardefs.desc: Indicates if this record was captured as a secondary 'reported' record rather than as an original primary source-of-truth record.  It may also indicate the source of the report.

ivardefs.name: requester
ivardefs.desc: The individual, organization, or device that initiated the request and has responsibility for its activation.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: A code specifying the current state of the order.  Generally, this will be active or completed state.

ivardefs.name: statusReason
ivardefs.desc: Captures the reason for the current state of the MedicationRequest.

ivardefs.name: subject
ivardefs.desc: A link to a resource representing the person or set of individuals to whom the medication will be given.

ivardefs.name: substitution
ivardefs.desc: Indicates whether or not substitution can or should be part of the dispense. In some cases, substitution must happen, in other cases substitution must not happen. This block explains the prescriber's intent. If nothing is specified substitution may be don

ivardefs.name: supportingInformation_
ivardefs.desc: Include additional information (for example, patient height and weight, a MedicationUsage for the patient) that supports the ordering of the medication.

properties.desc: An order or request for both supply of the medication and the instructions for administration of the medication to a patient. The resource is called "MedicationRequest" rather than "MedicationPrescription" or "MedicationOrder" to generalize the use across
